DataElement.preferredName: Endodontic Treatment Dental Restoration Therapy Involvement Next Decision Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the type of subsequent decision (the process of making a selective intellectual judgment when presented with several complex alternatives consisting of several variables, and usually defining a course of action or an idea) for treatment involvement in dental procedures to treat disease or injury to the tooth pulp, and may include palliative treatment and reeplacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Endodontic Treatment Dental Restoration Therapy Involvement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the involvement in dental procedures to treat disease or injury to the tooth pulp, and may include palliative treatment and reeplacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Dental procedures to treat disease or injury to the tooth pulp, and may include palliative treatment.:Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Dental procedures to treat disease or injury to the tooth pulp, and may include palliative treatment.
Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the type of subsequent decision (the process of making a selective intellectual judgment when presented with several complex alternatives consisting of several variables, and usually defining a course of action or an idea) for treatment involvement.

PermissibleValues.value: Temporize and refer the tooth for endodontics
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Temporize and refer the tooth for endodontics

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Temporize and refer the tooth for endodontics
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Temporize and refer the tooth for endodontics

PermissibleValues.value: Stop removing decay near the pulp horn and remove it elsewhere

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stop removing decay near the pulp horn and remove it elsewhere

PermissibleValues.value: Continue and remove all the decay

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Continue and remove all the decay
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Continue and remove all the decay in tooth

PermissibleValues.value: Proceed with an indirect pulp capping procedure
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Proceed with an indirect pulp capping procedure

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Proceed with an indirect pulp capping procedure
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Proceed with an indirect pulp capping procedure

PermissibleValues.value: Continue to remove the caries until it is slightly soft and stained or there is a pulp exposure
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Continue to remove the caries until it is slightly soft and stained or there is a pulp exposure
